name: Seoul Chicken
ingredients: 1/4 cup granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda

instructions.en: Place chicken thighs in a gallon size ziploc bag.
Mix remaining ingredients (except xanthan gum) in a small bowl.
Pour marinade into the bag with chicken, close and knead to coat all pieces.
Marinate in refrigerator for at least 1 hour, turning bag occasionally.
Transfer contents of bag to a 9x13" glass baking pan, arranging thighs skin side up.
Bake at 425ยบ for 35-40 minutes until meat is done.
Remove chicken from pan. Skim fat from juices, transfer to saucepan, and bring to boil.
Optionally thicken sauce with xanthan gum, whisking briskly.

notes: Makes 6-8 servings. Can be frozen. Unthickened pan juices can be served over chicken or Fried "Rice".
